Sponsor a tournament in this town. As the main sponsor, you have to pay 5000 coins for the tournament costs, as well as provide an adequate prize. Sponsoring games improves population loyalty towards you, and valuable prizes provide renown to your name.
Bu inanca kabul edilme kriterleri. İndüksiyon vaizler aracılığıyla yapılabilir. Vaizin rütbesine göre farklı şeyler talep edebilirler.

Kalradya imparatorluğunun imparatorluk dili. Bilginler dili saf tutmak için çaba göstermiş olsalar da, yerel kültürlerle yüzyıllarca süren temas, Calradian'ın az miktarda yerel kelime dağarcığı benimsemesine neden oldu. Bir prestij dili olan Kalradyanca kelime dağarcığı, kıtada tüccarlar, eğitimleri sırasında soylular veya İmparatorluk içinde daha iyi bir yaşam arayan köylüler tarafından sıklıkla kullanılan bir Lingua Franca olarak yararlı olması nedeniyle yabancı diller tarafından da sıklıkla benimsenmiştir.
Seçimler sırasında tımar alma şansı daha yüksek
Sığır, domuz ve orman köylerinin artan refahı
Improved settlement cultural assimilation\nReduced costs for convincing vassals to assume culture or faith
Extra influence as battle reward\nGain extra relations from victories with those that share faith

Once, there was naught between the Underworld, nested deep in the roots of the Great Oak, and the heavenly canopy of the gods. Pérkos struck the Great Tree's bark, and from it's sap, mankind blossomed. Such is the tale told by the children of the forest, that is, those that adhere to Pérkenweyd. Though the faith accepts a multitude of gods, the Thunder Wielder is idolized as their ultimate protector, the highest and noblest of gods, charged with protecting the Great Oak itself.
Stability for all settlements of acceptable cultures\nRenown gain for every successful raid on foreign villages

Among the children of the forest, many devouts, specially in the Chertyg region, have devoted themselves to Méhns. The Moon, in their understanding, is the source of prosperity for both land and mankind, and thus the Goddess gained popularity among believers. Although not a warrior as Pérkos, she is also believed to a protector of the children, in a motherly manner, as Méhns is solely responsible for keeping darkness away during nighttime.
Prosperity for all villages of acceptable cultures\nIncreased fertility
Aseray, İmparatorluk veya Kuzait kültürlerinin bir parçası değil.

Aseray, İmparatorluk veya Kuzait kültürlerinin bir parçası olmanız veya köyün ileri gelenleriyle (Faqir) ilişkiniz olması, bir Aseray eşiniz (İmam) veya 2'den yüksek bir klan seviyesine (Mürşid) sahip olmanız gerekir.
Only Battanians with 50 or more roguery are accepted.
Only members of the Southern Empire are accepted.
I would like to pledge myself to a cult.
Confirm it, {?PLAYER.GENDER}sister{?}brother{\\?} of the forest, and it will be done.
To whom would you pledge? The Thunder-Wielder Pérkos, or the godess Méhns?

What is forbidden? Not upholding family and tradition are crimes in the eyes of the gods. Likewise, betraying in act or word those you take as guests. But most of all, cravenness, of course. A craven is no child of forest, much like spoiled fruit is no nourishment. Fight with boldness or do not fight at all.
The struggle between righteousness and darkness is the nature of the worlds. Our world, that of mankind, lies right in its midst. Uphold all that is godly, or rot in darkness.
Hail to you, foreigner. Know that the spirits watch over all mankind, true believers or otherwise, and that no malice escapes their senses, and no misdeed goes unrecorded by the oak grain.
Hail to you, brethren. How can I help you? Do you wish to hear the truth of the gods, or, perhaps, foretell the future?

Alas, one born outside the embrace of the gods, can not choose to be embraced. Though one can be respected for their boldness, only a child of the forest can follow the path of the true gods - it is written in our ancestry. Such is the tale written in the oak grain.[if:convo_bored]

I ask of you only this - why have you not come before? My brethren of the woods, you have come to your home. The way of Pérkos, Méhns and all the gods of the heavenly canopy, that is your true nature. Your blood and bone.
Go now, and return to those of your kind, wherever they might be. The children of the forest only accept those born in it.[rf:convo_bored]

Be welcome as a child of the forest. Defend your brethren and your gods - fight our enemies fiercely, but also be kind to those that visit your hearth. Do not try and convince them of our ways - it is not their place. Yet it is ours to keep unharmed.[if:convo_excited]

When it comes to the gods, there is nothing the words of man can say that the rustling of leaves or burbling of rivers does not tell better. The forest, offspring of the Great Oak, holds the chronicles of the past. Truth, you see, is embedded within all that which is godly, be it the river flow or the oak grain. I merely interpret it.
But if you insist... We preach the way of the Thunder Wielder. Valor in defending your ancestry, honor in keeping your word, and generosity towards those you take into your hearth.

Naturally, to follow the way of Pérkos is to be a true faithful. Uphold honor, honesty and righteousness. Defend your brethren with valor, as the gods that perch upon the Great Oak do over men. Those you take into your hearth as guests - treat them as your own blood, as much as good sense allows.
Most importantly, uphold tradition and ancestry as a child of the forest, remain true to your family and multiply, lest the Great Oak is unrooted by darkness.

Pérkenweyd is a native faith of the Calradian continent, stretching from the Kachyar peninsula to the Chertyg mountains. Thus, it is the natural faith of the Vakken and Sturgian peoples. Though the Sturgians have been in contact with different cultures and faiths, the Sturgian populace remains true to their ancestry. Pérkenweyd, or 'tree lore', understands that the Great Oak is the source of life and root for the world of mankind. Besides the physical world, a dualistic view of Underworld and the Sacred Canopy separates what is good and bad, righteous and malicious. The Gods perch on the Sacred Canopy, atop the Great Oak, from where they defend and guide the children of the forest, that is, those that adhere to the faith. The children believe that spirits roam this world, and in the grains of oaks they chronicle all that which they witness. Experienced elders claim, however, that also the future may be known through the spirits, and as such are known to delve into divination practices. Moreover, believers argue that being a child of the forest is not a decision one takes, but is, instead, their ancestry. As such, a child of the forest must uphold the Gods, family and ancestry above all else.
The {FAITH} only accepts those of {STURGIA} and {VAKKEN} cultures
This rite is available to be performed.
Not enough time ({YEARS} years) have passed since the last rite of this type was performed.
You have no lord prisoners from Imperial contestors of the {KINGDOM}.
You are not part of the {KINGDOM}.
The current date must match the festival's traditional season and day of season.

A religious festival is a way to celebrate your faith and improve bonds with your fellow faithful. The festival will require a feast in a town or castle of yours. Piety will be awarded according to number of guests and their satisfaction with the feast, so be sure to provide plenty of good food and beverage.
The festival needs a town or castle to be performed in.
The festival may only be performed on the {ORDINAL} of {SEASON}.
Not enough time ({YEARS} years) has passed since the last rite of this type was performed.
You need lord prisoners to be sacrificed.
This rite requires a {TYPE} weapon of minimum tier {TIER}.

The Canticles is a the history of deeds of the Vlandic peoples. It understands the world as a collection of sagas, of which all people are parts of. It does not discriminate between cultures, nor does it see itself as a 'faith', bur rather, a fact. History is a long, bloody play. There are those who bask themselves in glory, and be worthy of writting about by the scriveners, and those who will be forgotten.
You need clan tier 3 or higher.
The {ITEM} was sacrificed in a sacred lynn!

As a gift for our Fian ancestors, a great blade must be offered for them to use it in the afterlife. They ought to be thrown deep into the sacred lynns, the most sacred passageways between the world of men and the underworld.

Astaronia, bride of Iovis and mother of Calradia. Though the Imperials are not native to the continent, that is how commonfolk think of her - the mother of all, regardless of 'native' faiths to the continent, and the Imperials as their legitimate children. On the equinox of Autumnus, she is celebrated as a symbol of motherhood, fertility and prosperity.
{?PLAYER.GENDER}My lady{?}My lord{\\?}, a feast for the Goddess would be a most pious choice. Let her ease the coming autumn and winter and bring us a bountiful spring.
The {ITEM} was offered to Pérkos, Thunder Wielder.
Other than his Thunder, the almighty God of the holy canopy is known to use his axe to defend the realm of mankind. A votive offering must be offered in his name to show our good faith.

{?PLAYER.GENDER}My lady{?}My lord{\\?}, the spirits teach us a blade is a virtuous offering for the Gods. The best its craftsmanship is, the more it pleases the Gods, as only the best man can craft is worthy of them.

The Festival of Pérkos is celebrated on the evennight of spring. To the children of the forest, spring represents the creation of the world of men. It is said no world existed between the heavenly home of the gods and birds and the underworld of snakes and worms, until Pérkos, the Tunder Wielder, struck the bark of the Great Oak and, from it's sap, mankind blossomed.
Affects the volume of settlement taxes. May SEVERELY impact AI and it's ability to recruit/keep troops. Default: 100%.
How much Xp troops need to upgrade. Vanilla is 100%. Default: 200%.
Start as a lord in a kingdom, with a Lordship title. Redcued influence for 5 years. The village you own can be managed by you. Gain Scholarship skill.
{?PLAYER.GENDER}My lady{?}My lord{\\?}, {HERO} has converted to your culture!
{?PLAYER.GENDER}My lady{?}My lord{\\?}, {NOTABLE} is now more favorable to us.
{?PLAYER.GENDER}My lady{?}My lord{\\?}, the hideout near {FIEF} was exterminated.
{?PLAYER.GENDER}My lady{?}My lord{\\?}, {HERO} is now more favorable to us.

Knight AI heroes can eventually form their own clans, even those in the player clan. Increasing this setting increases their speed of doing so. Setting it to 0% will stop knights from creating clans altogether. Default: 100%.

Title actions allow you multiple ways to use them. Actions that actively undermine other lords are considered hostile actions, and often cost denars, influence, your clan's renown, and relations with the affected, so take them wisely. On the other hand, an action such as Grant of a title is considered amicable and grows relations instead, at the cost of your ownership of the title.

A feudal elective succession is a compromise between a hereditary monarchy and a fully elective monarchy. Votes will be cast by the Peers, however the main candidates are the former ruler's family. However, title claimants will also be considered. If there is a scarcity of candidates available, strong families in the realm will also be considered candidates. If the chosen heir is from the former ruler's family, they will inherit the clan, regardless of Inheritance laws.
The {WORKSHOP} has been seized from the {OWNER} at {TOWN} due to war between your realms.
{SUZERAIN} holds your duty of military aid fulfilled. You have gained {INFLUENCE} and {RELATION} relation with your suzerain.
Due to abscence of other candidates, {HEIR} has inherited the {TITLE} uncontested.
Due to abscence of {CLAN} candidates, the {TITLE} succession will be voted on by the Peers of the realm.
De jure sovereign of this title
De jure vassal of this title
This councillor's competence in their position. The more competent they are, the more likely they are to trigger the tasks' effects and often with better results.

This task's current efficiency. Efficiency is stacked on top of competence, meaning that a task only functions fully as intended when at 100% efficiency. Some tasks are always at 100%. Others start at 0% and slowly build up to 100%. This means that some tasks require time investment, and switching between them is not productive.
{HERO} is a {TYPE} with {COMPETENCE}% competence for this position.
{HERO} current holds this position with a competence of {COMPETENCE}%.
Select who you would like to fill this position. The {POSITION} requires competency in {PRIMARY} and {SECONDARY} skills. {CURRENT}
Select who you would like to fill this position. The {POSITION} requires competency in the {PRIMARY} skill. {CURRENT}
The native language spoken by the council leader. Speaking the court language is important for councillours to fulfill their tasks adequately.

The council leader's faith. Spiritual positions need to follow the same faith. Other positions may be favored or not according to the candidate's faith, and how well predisposed the council owner's faith is towards it.

As a knight or knightess, this person will eventually attemp to lead their own household. Their progress is determined by the influence of the lordships they hold. This does not apply to direct relatives of the family leader.

The language of the Battanian peoples has long since been a cultural divide between Battanians and other kingdoms in the continent. Given that Palaic, its sister language and culture, has mostly been erased by Imperials, the Battanian language is almost completely unintelligible to all other cultures present in Calradia. However, with the increased presence of Calradian as the lingua franca of trade, Battanians have slowly adopted some Imperial vocabulary. The language is still somewhat similar to Vakken, another natural culture of the continent, though recently the Vakken culture has mostly been replaced by Sturgians.

Natural to the northern ends of Calradia, the Sturgians have an ancient linguistic tradition. Though this tradition has been recently shaken by the large mixing of nords, the Sturgian culture itself is native to the continent, as well as it's sister culture, Vakken, with which the Sturgian language still finds similarities.

The langauge of the steppe is often described by foreigners as curt, but effective. Due to the near absence of scholarly research in the Khuzait culture, it often lacks terms for technical, or more abstract concepts, and as such it is certain those will be adopted from the Imperial language.

Although the Aserai peoples speak a multitude of dialects, scattered across the oases, springs and coasts of the Nahasa, a distinct tradition of literalism and poety has established a common variation that has been embraced by the higher Aserai classes.

The Vakken, sometimes called 'children of the forest', are a group native to northern Calradia. Vakken and Sturgian cultures have ancient connections, as both have lived and traded for centuries before the Imperials arrived in the continent. However, with the prevailment of the Sturgia kingdom and culture, the Vakken tongue and tradition is being increasingly forgotten about in the north.

A rare skill in the continent, administrators are those specialized in the building of efficient, propserous towns. As most folks are preoccupied in not starving or dying violently, and education being rare and expensive, little has been developed in terms of planning efficient cities.

Essential to the economy, artisans produce manufactured goods in high demand, such as high quality textiles, tools, beer, and much more. As one inclined to the artisan world, you have keen insight into crafting and managing your workshops.

Universally shamed, yet universally present, no realm can fully rid itself of outlaws. More 'professional' outlaws will specialize in efficient plundering, speed and furtiveness to avoid law enforcement. Known outlaws often become notorious for kidnapping nobles and demanding unfair ransoms.

Milis eğitim tatbikatlarını ve hane halkının silah sahibi olma zorunluluğunu yasalaştırın. Devletin teşvik edilmesiyle, daha fazla işgücü üyesi, genel olarak iyileştirilmiş eğitim ve teçhizatın yanı sıra, tımar milislerinin aktif bir parçası haline gelir.

Halk içinde militarizmi teşvik edin. Daha fazla militarizm, nüfusun daha büyük bir kısmının insan gücü olarak hizmet edeceği ve daha hızlı yenilenen daha büyük insan gücü havuzlarına yol açacağı anlamına gelir. Eşraf ayrıca gönüllü yuvalarını daha hızlı dolduracak.
Bölgenizde uzun vadeli refahı teşvik edin. Artan kervan çekiciliği, daha fazla ticaret ve tarife geliri sağlar.

Üretim yöntemlerini ve kalite standartlarını organize edin Artan üretim, nüfus ve atölyelerin daha fazla ürün ürettiği anlamına gelirken, artan kalite, bu ürünlerin ortalama olarak üstün kalitede olduğu anlamına gelir.
Yurtluklarınız boyunca kültürünüzün varlığını tanıtın. Kültürünüzü takip eden bir halk daha istikrarlı, daha az asi ve daha fazla vergi ödüyor.
Artan kültürel varlık\nEşrafı rastgele olarak kültürünüze dönüştürün
Yurtlarınızdaki suç faaliyetlerini bastırarak güvenliği artırın.
Tüccarları ve köylüleri tehdit eden suçlu kaynaklarını ortadan kaldırarak kasaba sınırları dışında faaliyet gösteren suç ağlarını araştırın ve yok edin.
Vasal ilişkilerinin yönetimini devrederek daha fazla vasalı herhangi bir olumsuzluk yaşamadan korumanıza izin verin.
Yerel makamlarla delege ilişkileri. Eşraf gibi ileri gelenlerle daha güçlü bağlar, sadakat tımarlarına yol açar.
Yerleşim sadakatinde artış\nEşraf ile rastgele ilişki kazanımı
Akranlarla temsilci ilişkileri. Diğer ailelerle arasındaki konumu iyileştirin ve klan diyarda daha etkili olur.
Artan nüfuz sınırı\nKlanlarla ilişkileri rastgele artırın
Artan inanç varlığı\nEşrafı rastgele inancınıza dönüştürün
Ailenizde dindarlığı teşvik edin. Klan üyelerinin dindarlığını artırır, diğer inançların üyelerini dönüştürebilir.
Artan dindarlık\nKlan üyelerini rastgele olarak inancınıza dönüştürün
Tımarlara otomatik olarak uygun valiler atanacak\nValiler tarafından ele alınan sorunlar size ödül verecek
Ziyafet misafirleri, ziyafetleriniz hakkında daha iyi görüşlere sahip olacak
Şehirdeki yaşam kalitesini artıran sağlık önlemleri standartlarını teşvik edin. İyileştirilmiş sağlık kalitesi, nüfus artışını artırır.
Aile üyelerini iyileştirin ve onları iyi sağlık uygulamaları konusunda eğitin.
Zırh parçaları döv. Öğeler kültürünüzü takip edecek. Kaliteleri, demircinin becerisine bağlıdır - üretim yetenekleri ne kadar yüksekse, o kadar iyi öğeler yapabilirler.
At zırhları oluşturun. Öğeler kültürünüzü takip edecek. Kaliteleri, demircinin becerisine bağlıdır - üretim yetenekleri ne kadar yüksekse, o kadar iyi öğeler yapabilirler.
Yakın dövüş silahları oluşturun. Öğeler kültürünüzü takip edecek. Kaliteleri, demircinin becerisine bağlıdır - üretim yetenekleri ne kadar yüksekse, o kadar iyi öğeler yapabilirler.
Aile üyelerini tarih, edebiyat ve bilim konularında eğitin.
Tüm aile için Bilim xp bonusu
Kale muhafızı, kendi yetki alanları olan kale muhafızlığında fiilen bir lordun memurudur. Kalelerin bakımı ve savunmasından, gerekirse yaptırım uygulamaktan ve karar vermekten sorumludurlar.
Kaleler ve bağlı köyler için iyileştirilmiş refah
Zorla veya başka bir şekilde kanunun uygulanmasını denetleyin. Yasaların daha iyi uygulanması, ticaret için müreffeh bir ortam sağlar.
Ruhlar birçok türde adağı kabul etse de, Uchalion platosunda demir temel seçenek olmuştur. Ham doğasına rağmen, geniş kullanışlılığı nedeniyle Tanrılara layık bir hediye olarak ödüllendirilir.
